revision.text:
'''NPCs''' (or '''non-player characters''') act as helpful guides to the player, giving them information about different features in the game or hinting to the locations and requirements of certain [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]].
==NPCs by region==
===[[Kanto]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Oak.png|30px]]Professor Oak || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|Region]]. |- | Mom || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player about the NPCs. |- | [[File:Old Man.png|30px]]Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] || Teaches the player how to use the [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]] selector. |- | Battle Item Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Teaches the player about the use of [[Battle Items]]. |- | [[File:Scientist (female).png|30px]]Gem Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Tells the player about the [[Gems]] usage and how to get. |- | [[File:Burglar.png|30px]]Shady Salesman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Route 3 Pokémon Center]] || Talks about the Shop Magikarp. |- | Berry Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Gives the player hints about [[Berries|Berry]] farming. |- | [[File:Super Nerd.png|30px]]Super Nerd Jovan || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Tells the player to download saves more frequently. |- | [[File:Gentleman (Gen 4).png|30px]]Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about Typed [[Eggs]] |- | Shard Apprentice || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about [[Shards]] |- | [[File:Mr. Fuji.png|30px]]Mr. Fuji || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about increased rates of [[Shiny Chance|Shiny Pokémon]] |- | [[File:Channeler.png|30px]]Channeler Karina || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] Menu |- | [[File:Beauty (trainer).png|30px]]Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Shops|Shop]] amount button. |- | Battle Item Master 2 || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about stacking [[Battle Items]]. |- | [[File:Pokémon Breeder (female).png|30px]]Breeder || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about breeding Pokémons. |- | [[File:Youngster.png|30px]]Youngster Wendy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuchsia City]] || Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | [[File:Scientist (male).png|30px]]Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] || Informs the player about the [[Roaming Pokémon|Roaming Nature]] of {{Pokemon|Mew}}. |- | [[File:Celio.png|30px]]Celio || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Gives the player the quest to clear the Biker from Three Island. |- | [[File:Youngster.png|30px]]Youngster || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|One Island]] || Informs the player about {{Pokemon|Moltres}} and makes a joke about it. |- | [[File:Biker Goon.png|30px]]Biker || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Three Island]] || After beating the gang, despair of not beeing able to leave the island. |- | [[File:Bug Catcher.png|30px]]Bug Catcher John || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Six Island]] || Informs the player about the [[Roaming Pokémon|Roaming Nature]] of {{Pokemon|Pink Butterfree}} and {{Pokemon|Ash's Butterfree}} and Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Ruin Maniac || [[Altering Cave]] || Informs the player they have acess to the Pinkan Island. |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Professor Ivy.png|30px]]Professor Ivy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Valencian Pokémon Center]] || Talks about the Valencian Pokémon forms found in that island. |- | [[Tanoby Ruins]] || Talks about the Unown Dungeon rotation in [[Tanoby Ruins]], [[Ruins of Alph]] and [[Solaceon Ruins]], talks about the [[Tanoby Ruins]] exlusive Unowns, being {{Pokemon|Unown (?)}} and {{Pokemon|Unown (!)}}. She mentions that she caught a {{Pokemon|Pinkan Dodrio}} which she is trading. |- | [[File:Officer Jenny.png|30px]]Officer Jenny || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pinkan Pokémon Reserve]] || Informs the player that she is trading Pinkan Pokémon for [[File:Pinkan.png|30px]]Pinkan Berries. |- | [[File:Sign Post.png|30px]]Welcome Sign || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Client Island]] || Welcomes the player in the Client Island. |- | [[File:Red Spearow.png|30px]]Red Spearow || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Client Island]] || Welcomes the player with ''*weird spearow noises*'' into the Client Island. |} '''Note:''' The Client Island appears in Sevii 123 while playing in the '''client'''.
===[[Johto]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Elm.png|30px]]Professor Elm || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|New Bark Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:Mr. Pokémon.png|30px]]Mr. Pokémon || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cherrygrove City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Pokémon Day Care|Hatchery]] Queue feature. |- | Earl Dervish || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player about [[Baby Pokémon]]. |- | Primo || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Violet City]] || Teaches the player how to us [[Held Items]]. |- | [[File:Elder Li.png|30px]]Elder Li || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Ilex Forest|location]] and [[Questlines#Unfinished Business|requirement]] needed to unlock {{Pokemon|Celebi}}. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker Daniel || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Azalea Town]] || Tells the player about the [[Union Cave|location]] and requirement needed for {{Pokemon|Lapras}} to appear. |- | [[File:Bill.png|30px]]Bill || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player the requirements of {{Pokemon|Espeon}} and {{Pokemon|Umbreon}}. |- | [[File:Poké Maniac.png|30px]]Pokéfan Derek || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Ecruteak City]] || Tells the player that they now have access to the three legendary Beasts. |- | [[File:Sailor.png|30px]]SS Aqua Captain || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Olivine City]] || Tells the player about the [[Dock]]. |- | Photography Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Cianwood City]] || Tells the player about [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]]. |- | Souvenir Shop Attendant || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Mahogany Town]] || Tells the player about [[Item Magnet]] effects. |- | [[File:Poké Maniac.png|30px]]Pokéfan Trevor || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Blackthorn City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Johto|Indigo Plateau Johto]] || Informs the player that [[Kanto]] is located in the east of [[Johto]]. |}
===[[Hoenn]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Professor Birch.png|30px]]Professor Birch || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Birch's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Littleroot Town]] || Tells the player about updates to the Hatchery Queue. |- | [[File:Scientist (male).png|30px]]Tracking Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Oldale Town]] || Tells the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Latios}} and {{Pokemon|Latias}}. |- | [[File:Reporter.png|30px]]Reporter Gabby || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Slateport City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | Professor Cozmo || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fallarbor Town]] || Informs the player about [[File:Deoxys.png|30px|link = Battle Frontier]] [[Battle Frontier|Deoxys]]. |- | Soot Collector || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Lavaridge Town]] || Informs the player about the [[Flutes]] Location and about the Gem cost of Using [[Flutes]]. |- | Weatherman || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Informs the player about the several forms of {{Pokemon|Castform}}. |- | [[File:Pokémon Ranger (female).png|30px]]Pokémon Ranger Catherine || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || Tells the player about the overuse of the [[Dowsing Machine]]. |- | [[File:Steven.png|30px]]Steven || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Fortree City]] || "Awards" the player a picture of an invisble Kecleon [[File:Kecleon Drawing.png|30px]]. |- | Astronomer || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Mossdeep City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Jirachi}}. |- | Diver || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Pacifidlog Town]] || Teaches the player about Dungeon Loot rates increasing with clears |- | [[File:Wallace.png|30px]]Gym Leader Wallace || [[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|Sootopolis City]] || Tells the player about the [[Cave of Origin|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Hoenn|requirement]] needed to unlock {{Pokemon|Groudon}} and {{Pokemon|Kyogre}}. |- | [[File:Regi Hints.png|30px|link=Questlines#The Three Golems]]Hidden Message || [[Sealed Chamber]] || Strange markings that leads to the [[Questlines#The Three Golems|Regis]] chamber. |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Braille Enthusiast || [[Sealed Chamber]] || Helps the player read the strange markings in the walls. |}
===[[Sinnoh]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Contest Champion (Johanna).png|30px]]Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Mesprit}}. |- | [[File:Professor Rowan.png|30px]]Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Manaphy}}. |- | [[File:Aroma Lady.png|30px]]Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Eevee}} into {{Pokemon|Leafeon}}. |- | [[File:Lass.png|30px]]Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for {{Pokemon|Rotom}} and its forms. |- | [[File:Worker.png|30px]]Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Nosepass}} into {{Pokemon|Probopass}}. |- | Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Magneton}} into {{Pokemon|Magnezone}}. |- | Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Cherrim (Overcast)}} into {{Pokemon|Cherrim (Sunshine)}}. |- | [[File:Burglar.png|30px]] Burglar || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalve City]] || Tells the player the why the Razor [[Evolution Items]] don't work during the Day. |- | [[File:Riley.png|30px]]Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve {{Pokemon|Riolu}}. |- | Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Cresselia}}. |- | Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Eevee}} into {{Pokemon|Glaceon}}. |- | [[File:Beauty (trainer).png|30px]]Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Piloswine}} into {{Pokemon|Mamoswine}}. |- | [[File:Ace Trainer (male).png|30px]]Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
===[[Unova]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Musician.png|30px]]Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Meloetta (Aria)}} |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Ruin Maniac || [[Relic Castle]] || Informs the player how to get {{Pokemon|Volcarona}} |- | [[File:School Kid (female).png|30px]]Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Tornadus}} and {{Pokemon|Thundurus}}. |- | [[File:Backpacker (male).png|30px]]Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | [[File:Gentleman.png|30px]]Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[File:Black DNA.png|30px]][[Black DNA]] and [[File:White DNA.png|30px]][[White DNA]] |- | [[File:Professor Juniper.png|30px]]Professor Juniper || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:Professor Burner.png|30px]]Professor Burnet || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || Explains to the player how to obtain [[Dream Orbs]]. |- | [[File:Dream Researcher.png|30px]]Dream Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || Talks about [[Dream Orbs]] and hints at a reward if the player interact enough times with the mechanic. |- | [[File:Team Plasma (colress).png|30px]]Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pokémon in the lab. |}
===[[Kalos]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Sycamore.png|30px]]Professor Sycamore || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Engineer || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] || Informs the player about the [[Kalos Power Plant|location]] and [[Gyms#Pokémon League Kalos|requirement]] for {{Pokemon|Volcanion}} |- | Flabébé Enthusiast || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Camphrier City]] || Informs the player how to obtain {{Pokemon|Flabébé (Yellow)}} and {{Pokemon|Flabébé (Blue)}}. |- | [[File:Korrina.png|30px]]Korrina || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Shalour City]] || Informs the player where can you buy a [[Key Stone]] and to check the Pokedex for progression through the requirements to [[Mega Evolution|Mega evolve]] a Pokémon. |- | Birdwatcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Coumarine City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of the legendary birds. |- | [[File:Furisode Girl Katherine.png|30px]]Furisode Girl Katherine || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Laverre City]] || Explains the [[Kalos#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve {{Pokemon|Sliggoo}} into {{Pokemon|Goodra}}. |- | [[File:Hex Maniac.png|30px]]Hex Maniac Melanie || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Anistar City]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:Hiker.png|30px]]Confused Hiker || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Kiloude City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Hoopa}}. |- | Mystery Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Santalune City]] || Informs the player of a Pokémon interested in a [[Enigma|enigmatic Berry]]. |- | Spelunker || [[Reflection Cave]] || Informs the player of the [[Questlines#Princess Diancie|requirements]] to obtain a princess-like Pokémon. |- |}
===[[Alola]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Scratch Cat Girl.png|30px]]Scratch Cat Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town Outskirts]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Lycanroc (Dusk)}} Requirement |- | [[File:Professor Kukui.png|30px]]Professor Kukui || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Professor Kukui's Lab]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | [[File:Teacher (gen 7).png|30px]]Teacher Emily || [[Trainers' School]] || Explains how dungeon floors work |- | [[File:Hala.png|30px]]Kahuna Hala || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Iki Town]] || Explains The Trials And Grand Trials |- | [[File:Looker.png|30px]]Looker || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Roadside Motel]] || Talks about Ultra Beasts and explain how to catch them |- | [[File:Owner.png|30px]]Café Owner || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Heahea City]] || Informs the player about The Trials of Akala island and The Kahuna. |- | [[File:Actor.png|30px]]Actor Meredith || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Paniola Town]] || Informs the player about Oricorio and the berry colors that attracted it in the farm. |- | [[File:Preschooler (female).png|30px]]Spectator || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]] || Informs the player about the {{Pokemon|Alolan Raichu}} and {{Pokemon|Alolan Exeggutor}} Evolution Requirements. |- | [[File:Olivia.png|30px]]Kahuna Olivia || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Konikoni City]] || Informs the player about The Alola Pokémon League |- | [[File:Aether Branch Chief Wicke.png|30px]]Aether Branch Chief Wicke || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Aether Paradise]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route |- | [[File:Nanu.png|30px]]Kahuna Nanu || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Malie City]] || Informs the player of the requirements to fight him |- | [[File:Worker.png|30px]]Worker Ovid || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Tapu Village]] || Informs the player about how to evolve {{Pokemon|Crabrawler}} into {{Pokemon|Crabominable}} |- | [[File:Team Plasma (colress).png|30px]] Colress || [[Mount Lanakila]] || Talks about the Light [[Evolution Items]] drop from {{Pokemon|Solgaleo}}, {{Pokemon|Lunala}} and {{Pokemon|Necrozma}}. |- | [[File:Mina.png|30px]]Captain Mina || [[Towns & Cities#Alola|Seafolk Village]] || Informs the player of the Requirements of [[Mina's Houseboat]] Dungeon and where the next Kahuna is |- |}
===[[Galar]] NPCs===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Mum || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Postwick]] || Informs the [[Gyms#Pokémon League Galar|requirement]] to unlock the [[Slumbering Weald Shrine|Slumbering Weald]]. |- | [[File:Rail Staff.png|30px]]Rail Staff || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Wedgehurst]] || Informs the [[Gyms#Pokémon League Galar|requirement]] to acess other areas of the Region. |- | [[File:Professor Sonia.png|30px]]Professor Sonia || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Wedgehurst]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route in [[Galar|South Galar]]. |- | [[File:Professor Magnolia.png|30px]]Professor Magnolia || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Professor Magnolia's House]] || Tells the player to wait for the Blimp to arrive. |- | Assistant Henry || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Professor Magnolia's House]] || Informs how the requirement to evolve {{Pokemon|Galarian Linoone}} into {{Pokemon|Obstagoon}}. |- | [[File:Battle Café Master.png|30px]]Battle Café Master || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Motostoke]] || Explains how the [[Battle Café]] works to the player. |- | [[File:Artist (Gen 8).png|30px]]Artist Duncan || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Motostoke]] || Informs the player how to evolve {{Pokemon|Galarian Farfetch'd}} into {{Pokemon|Sirfetch'd}}. |- | [[File:Cook.png|30px]]Cook Stuart || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Turrfield]] || Informs how to evolve {{Pokemon|Applin}} into {{Pokemon|Flapple}} and {{Pokemon|Appletun}}. |- | Meteorologist || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Hulbury]] || Informs the [[Galar#Weather-dependent Pokémon|requirement]] for the {{Pokemon|Cramorant}} and {{Pokemon|Eiscue (Ice Face)}} forms. |- | [[File:Hiker (Gen 8).png|30px]]Hiker Donald || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Hammerlocke]] || Informs the [[Weather]] needed for {{Pokemon|Cramorant (Gulping)}} and {{Pokemon|Cramorant (Gorging)}}. |- | [[File:Ancient Mural Ruins.png|30px]]Ancient Mural Ruins || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Stow-on-Side]] || It’s the statues that were hidden behind Stow-on-Side’s famous mural. They depict two heroes and two Pokémon. |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Archeologist || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Stown-on-Side]] || Informs the [[Galar#Location-dependent Pokémon|requirement]] to evolve {{Pokemon|Galarian Yamask}} into {{Pokemon|Runerigus}}. |- | [[File:Hero's Bath.png|30px]]Hero's Bath || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Circhester]] || The ancient Hero’s Bath. They say this is where the two heroes came to soothe their wounds after the battle to bring down that evil presence, long ago.. |- | [[File:Guitarist (male).png|30px]]Guitarist Justin || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Circhester]] || Informs the requirement to evolve {{Pokemon|Snom}} to {{Pokemon|Frosmoth}}. |- | [[File:Team Yell Grunts.png|30px]]Team Yell Grunts || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Spikemuth]] || Informs the player the [[Wacan|Berry]] that {{Pokemon|Morpeko (Hangry)}} likes to [[Wandering Pokémon|wander]]. |- | [[File:Master Dojo Student.png|30px]]Master Dojo Student || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Master Dojo]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route in [[Galar|Isle of Armor]]. |- | [[File:Peony.png|30px]] Chad Peony || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || Chad Peony thanks the player for helping him with his Adven-tour. |- | Freezington Mayor || [[Towns & Cities#Galar|Freezington]] || Informs the player the Boosted Roamer Rate Route in [[Galar|Crown Tundra]]. |}
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
